entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of light snow beginning near midnight and ending before morning. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
